meanings.definition: Finely cut cabbage that has been fermented.
meanings.sent1: I added a spoonful of sauerkraut to my hot dog.
meanings.sent2: My grandma makes delicious sauerkraut for family dinners.
meanings.sent3: The sauerkraut danced in the pot as it fermented.
meanings.sent4: The smell of sauerkraut filled the kitchen, reminding me of home.
meanings.sent5: The tangy taste of sauerkraut tickled my taste buds.

meanings.definition: A German dish made from fermented cabbage.
meanings.sent1: Have you ever tried sauerkraut with sausages?
meanings.sent2: The Oktoberfest celebration featured traditional sauerkraut.
meanings.sent3: The sauerkraut told a joke to the bratwurst on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The sauerkraut was a flavorful blanket over the sausage.
meanings.sent5: The sourness of sauerkraut added a zing to the meal.
